title: New Server Opens
content: The new server opens it's doors, allowing the denizens of the First King's Realm to settle the lands of the Second King's Realm.
It should be noted that PVP is forbidden for the entirety of Sunday 21st August.

title: First Ducal Coronations, 2E
content: There are new Duchies to claim, unexplored lands to turn into city states, and vast swathes of tillable land to farm.
Will you make a claim? Be sure to attend the First Ducal Coronations of the Second Era (2E)!
